Structs/SQLErrorType.html#/s:6SQLKit12SQ.name: io
Structs/SQLErrorType.html#/s:6SQLKit12SQ.abstract: An IO error occured during database query.

Structs/SQLErrorType.html#/s:6SQLKit12SQ.name: constraint
Structs/SQLErrorType.html#/s:6SQLKit12SQ.abstract: A constraint violation occurred during database query.

Structs/SQLErrorType.html#/s:6SQLKit12SQ.name: unknown
Structs/SQLErrorType.html#/s:6SQLKit12SQ.abstract: An unknown error occured while performing database query.

Structs/SQLUpdate.html#/s:6SQLKit9SQLUpd.abstract: Zero or more identifier: expression pairs to update.

Structs/SQLFunction.html#/s:6SQLKit11SQL.abstract: Convenience for creating a COALESCE(foo) function call (returns the first non-null expression).

Structs/SQLCreateTable.html#/s:6SQLKit14.name: temporary
Structs/SQLCreateTable.html#/s:6SQLKit14.abstract: If the TEMP or TEMPORARY keyword occurs between the CREATE and TABLE then the new table is created in the temp database.

Structs/SQLCreateTable.html#/s:6SQLKit14.name: ifNotExists

Structs/SQLCreateTable.html#/s:6SQLKit14.name: tableConstraints
Structs/SQLCreateTable.html#/s:6SQLKit14.abstract: Table constraints, such as FOREIGN KEY, to add.

Structs/SQLColumnDefinition.html#/s:6SQL.name: init(column:dataType:constraints:)
Structs/SQLColumnDefinition.html#/s:6SQL.abstract: Creates a new SQLColumnDefinition from column identifier, data type, and zero or more constraints.

Structs/SQLColumnConstraint.html#/s:6SQL.name: primaryKey
Structs/SQLColumnConstraint.html#/s:6SQL.abstract: Creates a new PRIMARY KEY column constraint with default DEFAULT settings

Structs/SQLColumnConstraint.html#/s:6SQL.name: notNull
Structs/SQLColumnConstraint.html#/s:6SQL.abstract: Creates a new NOT NULL column constraint with no constraint name.

Structs/SQLBind.html.name: SQLBind
Structs/SQLBind.html.abstract: A parameterizied value bound to the SQL query.

Structs/SQLColumnConstraint.html.name: SQLColumnConstraint
Structs/SQLColumnConstraint.html.abstract: SQL column data integrity constraint, i.e., NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY, etc.

Structs/SQLColumnDefinition.html.name: SQLColumnDefinition
Structs/SQLColumnDefinition.html.abstract: Table column definition. DDL. Used by SQLCreateTable and SQLAlterTable.

Structs/SQLCreateTable.html.name: SQLCreateTable
Structs/SQLCreateTable.html.abstract: The CREATE TABLE command is used to create a new table in a database.

Protocols/SQLQueryFetcher.html#/s:6SQLKi.name: first()
Protocols/SQLQueryFetcher.html#/s:6SQLKi.abstract: Collects the first raw output and returns it.

Protocols/SQLQueryFetcher.html#/s:6SQLKi.name: all()
Protocols/SQLQueryFetcher.html#/s:6SQLKi.abstract: Collects all raw output into an array and returns it.

Protocols/SQLQueryFetcher.html#/s:6SQLKi.name: run(_:)
Protocols/SQLQueryFetcher.html#/s:6SQLKi.abstract: Runs the query, passing output to the supplied closure as it is recieved.

Protocols/SQLPredicateBuilder.html#/s:6S.name: where(_:_:column:)
Protocols/SQLPredicateBuilder.html#/s:6S.abstract: Adds a column to column comparison to this builder’s WHERE clause.

Protocols/SQLPredicateBuilder.html#/s:6S.abstract: Adds a column comparison to this builder’s WHERE clause.

Protocols/SQLColumnBuilder.html.name: SQLColumnBuilder
Protocols/SQLColumnBuilder.html.abstract: Builds data-definition queries that support creating columns, i.e., CREATE TABLE and ALTER TABLE.

Protocols/SQLQueryBuilder.html.name: SQLQueryBuilder
Protocols/SQLQueryBuilder.html.abstract: Builds queries and executes them on a connection.

Protocols/SQLError.html.name: SQLError
Protocols/SQLError.html.abstract: An error from a SQL query or database operation.

Enums/SQLLiteral.html#/s:6SQLKit10SQLLit.name: numeric(_:)
Enums/SQLLiteral.html#/s:6SQLKit10SQLLit.abstract: Creates a new SQLLiteral from a numeric string (no quotes).

Enums/SQLLiteral.html#/s:6SQLKit10SQLLit.abstract: Creates a new default SQLLiteral literal, i.e., DEFAULT or sometimes NULL.

Enums/SQLLiteral.html#/s:6SQLKit10SQLLit.abstract: Creates a new boolean SQLLiteral, i.e., FALSE or sometimes 0.

Enums/SQLForeignKeyAction.html#/s:6SQLKi.name: noAction
Enums/SQLForeignKeyAction.html#/s:6SQLKi.abstract: Produce an error indicating that the deletion or update would create a foreign key constraint violation.

Enums/SQLForeignKeyAction.html#/s:6SQLKi.name: restrict
Enums/SQLForeignKeyAction.html#/s:6SQLKi.abstract: Produce an error indicating that the deletion or update would create a foreign key constraint violation.

Enums/SQLForeignKeyAction.html#/s:6SQLKi.name: cascade
Enums/SQLForeignKeyAction.html#/s:6SQLKi.abstract: Delete any rows referencing the deleted row, or update the values of the referencing column(s) to the new values of the referenced columns, respectively.

Enums/SQLForeignKeyAction.html#/s:6SQLKi.name: setDefault
Enums/SQLForeignKeyAction.html#/s:6SQLKi.abstract: Set the referencing column(s) to their default values.

Enums/SQLDirection.html#/s:6SQLKit12SQLD.name: null
Enums/SQLDirection.html#/s:6SQLKit12SQLD.abstract: Order in which NULL values come first.

Enums/SQLDirection.html#/s:6SQLKit12SQLD.name: notNull
Enums/SQLDirection.html#/s:6SQLKit12SQLD.abstract: Order in which NOT NULL values come first.

Enums/SQLForeignKeyAction.html.name: SQLForeignKeyAction
Enums/SQLForeignKeyAction.html.abstract: RESTRICT | CASCADE | SET NULL | NO ACTION | SET DEFAULT

Enums/SQLLockingClause.html.abstract: General locking expressions for a SQL locking clause.
